discussion_comments.comment_body:
Printing all environment variables may expose sensitive information; consider removing this debug statement or sanitizing its output.
```suggestion
print("Environment variables (sanitized):")
print({k: v for k, v in os.environ.items() if "TOKEN" not in k and "PASSWORD" not in k and "SECRET" not in k})
```
